thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Gumtree condemns toddler-for-sale ad

author: news24.com
title: Gumtree condemns toddler-for-sale ad
text:
Pietermaritzburg â€“ Gumtree South Africa has condemned an advert posted on their website offering a child for sale.
A 20-year-old woman was arrested in Pietermaritzburg for trying to sell her toddler for R5 000 on the online classifieds site on Thursday.
The arrest came after an undercover agent arranged to buy the 19-month-old child from her. The child was handed into the care of a social worker.
The mother was to have appeared in the Pietermaritzburg Magistrate's Court on Friday. She would face human trafficking charges.
